akas from release info: I Want to Work for Diddy (original title)
I Want to Work for Diddy 2 USA (second season title)

1.title: Welcome to Bad Boy

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Eleven applicants from across the country arrive in Manhattan for their first assignment: to help Diddy promote his new album.

2.title: Sean John Reinvented

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Sean John clothing has changed its logo and the Uptown and Downtown teams must each design a new print campaign to celebrate the brand's reinvention.

3.title: Chariots for Charity

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Both teams must collect donations for the inner city kids of the Fresh Air Fund using a rather interesting mode of self-propelled transportation.

4.title: Diddy or Didn't He

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: The teams are told they must assist Mr. Combs in doing a series of press interviews.

5.title: A Night in Daddy's House

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: It's time for the applicants to enter the heart of Bad Boy: Diddy's recording studio, Daddy's House.

6.title: Truth and Its Consequences

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Diddy sends the applicants to an honesty retreat at a lush Japanese garden, where they meet Dr. Greg, who?s devised some very intimate exercises to lessen tensions among the applicants.

7.title: A Family Affair

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: The four remaining applicants get a taste of life in Diddy's inner circle when they must arrange a dinner party for Diddy's mother, sons, and close personal friends, including his recording artists Dawn and Kaleena of Dirty Money.

8.title: The Fashion Event

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: It's their hardest challenge yet: the applicants must plan and execute a fashion preview of Sean John's holiday line for an audience of buyers. They are given a venue, budget, access to models, a room full of mannequins and the clothing for the event.

9.title: The Fashion Event: Part 2

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: The final three applicants find themselves overwhelmed as they attempt to pull off this larger-than-life fashion event. Just when it seems the pressure can't get any greater, some four-legged fashionistas arrive to make their job even tougher.

10.title: Finale

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: It's down to the final two applicants, and for the deciding test, they must report to the top floor of Bad Boy to work for the man himself. He puts them through their paces, testing their dedication, work ethic and their sense of humor.

1.title: Welcome to Bad Boy

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Thirteen hopefuls arrive in New York City from across the country, eager to enter the world of Bad Boy Entertainment.

2.title: No Bitchassness Allowed

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: The contestants are awakened in the middle of the night, and shuttled to the woods at Fort Dix Army Base in New Jersey. By following clues and hidden markers, the potential Diddy-assistants must find their way back to the Bad Boy headquarters in New York.

3.title: Go Get the Model

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Two contestants from each team are sent to Paris to find a model that Diddy saw in a magazine. They must convince her to come back to New York to pose for Sean John. The remaining members are tasked with creating print ad for Sean John eye-wear.

4.title: Diddy.com

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Diddy surprises the assistants by appearing on his website, Diddy.com, with a special mission.

5.title: Hooray for Hollywood!

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: It's an historic day for Sean Diddy Combs because he's getting his star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. So, the entire group jets off to Los Angeles.

6.title: Unforgivable Hustle

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: For Diddy, it's all about the bottom line and this mission puts our assistants on the front lines selling Diddy's personal fragrance, Unforgiveable, in Manhattan's premium cosmetic stores - Sephora.

7.title: One Night Only

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Nobody throws a party like Diddy. Every detail from the guest list to the DJ to the dÃ©cor is planned to the last detail.

8.title: New York Hustle

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Being able to make something out of nothing is a key talent for any Diddy assistant.

9.title: Show Me the Monae

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Diddy is throwing a Manhattan showcase for his new, hot artist Janelle Monae.Â The stakes are real Â- because selling a Bad Boy artist to the public, press, and industry VIPs is at the core of Diddy's business.

10.title: Finale

episode of.title: I Want to Work for Diddy (TV Series 2008– )

imdb.plot outline: New contestants compete for another opportunity to become rapper and fashion designer Sean John's assistant in this Season 2. But there is a twist, Diddy's brought back the most controversial contestant & break-out star from Season 1, Poprah. She's a spy in the competition working undercover for Diddy then becomes the host/mediator for the eliminations before contestants face their final judgment.
imdb.title: I Want to Work for Diddy
plot: Contestants compete for an opportunity to become rapper and fashion designer Sean John's assistant.::IMDb editor

New contestants compete for another opportunity to become rapper and fashion designer Sean John's assistant in this Season 2. But there is a twist, Diddy's brought back the most controversial contestant & break-out star from Season 1, Poprah. She's a spy in the competition working undercover for Diddy then becomes the host/mediator for the eliminations before contestants face their final judgment.::Anonymous
